mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( member_key, member_name, member_id, member_pwd, member_email, member_role ) VALUES ( member_seq.nextval, #{member_name}, #{member_id}, #{member_pwd}, #{member_email}, 'EMP' )
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM team_member mem, team, project p where member_key = #{member_key} and mem.team_key = team.team_key and team.project_key = p.project_key ORDER BY p.PROJECT_KEY desc

SELECT MEMBER.* FROM MEMBER, team_member mem, team, project p WHERE team.PROJECT_KEY = p.PROJECT_KEY AND team.TEAM_KEY = mem.TEAM_KEY AND mem.MEMBER_KEY = MEMBER.MEMBER_KEY AND p.PROJECT_KEY = #{project_key}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invite_member ( invite_key, invited_member, invitee_email, joined ) VALUES ( invite_seq.nextval, #{member_key}, #{member_email}, '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM invite_member ORDER BY invite_key desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO role_request ( request_key, member_key, request_comment, admin_comment, request_state, request_date ) VALUES ( role_seq.nextval, #{member_key}, #{comment}, '', 'request', sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT REQUEST_KEY, MEMBER_KEY, REQUEST_COMMENT, ADMIN_COMMENT, REQUEST_STATE, TO_CHAR(REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') FROM role_request WHERE member_key = #{member_key} ORDER BY REQUEST_KEY desc
SELECT REQUEST_KEY, MEMBER_KEY, REQUEST_COMMENT, ADMIN_COMMENT, REQUEST_STATE, TO_CHAR(REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') FROM role_request WHERE REQUEST_KEY = #{request_key}
